title: Amaretto Baked Apples
introduction: Amaretto Baked Apples combine the sweet and subtly bitter flavors of amaretto liqueur and amaretti cookies with the crisp, tender essence of baked golden delicious apples. These delightful apples are both an elegant dessert and a comforting treat.
ingredients: 6 baking apples, such as golden delicious
instructions: Place a rack in the center of the oven. Preheat the oven to 375Â°F. Butter a baking dish just large enough to hold the apples standing upright.
Remove the apple cores and peel the apples about two-thirds of the way down from the stem end.
Place the amaretti cookies in a plastic bag and crush them gently with a heavy object, such as a rolling pin. In a medium bowl, blend the crumbs with the sugar and butter.
Stuff a little of the mixture into the center of each apple. Spoon the amaretto over the apples. Pour 1 cup water around the apples.
Bake 45 minutes or until the apples are tender when pierced with a knife. Serve warm or at room temperature.
